body_html:
What worked for me was adding the path to my nvidia installation to LD_LIBRARY_PATH variable :

export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/local/cuda-9.0/lib64${LD_LIBRARY_PATH:+:${LD_LIBRARY_PATH}}:/usr/lib/nvidia-396/

Of course instead of nvidia-396 use your driver's version.

body:
What worked for me was adding the path to my nvidia installation to `LD_LIBRARY_PATH` variable : 

```
export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/local/cuda-9.0/lib64${LD_LIBRARY_PATH:+:${LD_LIBRARY_PATH}}:/usr/lib/nvidia-396/
```

Of course instead of `nvidia-396` use your driver's version.
